name: Monkey Madness (ShreyGandhi)
description:
We are monkey who has encountered a Mysterious Forest where there are different kinds of spices and those spices find you weird and they try to attack you. 

We as a survivor we need to dodge all the enemies and reach a safe spot which clears the level for you. But enemies also fire bullets so be CAUTIOUS !! 

For Player Controls we have

PlayStation Controller :- Directional pad to move player and X - jump

Keyboard :- Arrow keys to move and Space - jump

You can Access Game Design Document inside the game download file
